Articles.Content: Tommorow at 6 PM GMT, (not taking into account for time change), Vincent, or LeGoldfish, is doing a five hour live stream to raise money for a little girl he met while teaching in South Africa. This girl, named Precious, moved to South Africa from Malawi in hope to go to school and become a doctor to help many other people. For a better explanation, check this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6nmLhE4eRhM. Le Goldfish will be playing Kerbal Space Program and possibly a few other games for five hours, all in an effort to raise money, so, come along, enjoy the stream, and hopefully help out!
